Text:

Just one question - will this version work on mac? I have a friend who's a mac user and wants to play them.
thank you :) was just wondering will you be posting up episode 4 ?

amazing download. the games are so great. thanks!
don't wanna bug you, but you've got another request for the 4th episode! (:

Hey are you guys ever going to release episode 4 for this series? Would be nice since the torrents for it elsewhere are UK only installs.
Can you upload Episode Four of this game? Shadows of the Vashta Nerada, would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you so much this is awesome!!!! I love Doctor Who but i'm stuck waiting for the new eps so it's nice to be able to play these! Would you be able to post the 4th episode and maybe the new one, The Gunpowder Plot? Correct me if i'm wrong, but I think it's out now.
I don't know if this is just me, but when i tried to open the game it said type your name to start or whatever but i couldn't type anything. Anyone else have that problem?
